channel.title: Comments on: C# Extension methods and strings …

item.title: By: Thomas Freudenberg
item.dc:creator: Thomas Freudenberg
item.description: I admit I wouldn't use it myself. If someone else is reading the code without knowing about the extension method he might be confused by the evident NullReferenceException.
item.content:encoded: I admit I wouldn’t use it myself. If someone else is reading the code without knowing about the extension method he might be confused by the evident NullReferenceException.
